mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SUGGEST (SG_NO, SG_TITLE, SG_CONTENT, BS_USER, PS_USER, RESUME_NO, RA_NUM, SEND_DATE) VALUES (#{sgNo},#{sgTitle},#{sgContent},#{bsUser},#{psUser},#{resumeNo},#{raNum}, SYSDATE )
SELECT MAX(SG_NO) +1 FROM SUGGEST
mapper.select: SELECT SG.SG_NO, UT.USER_NAME, UT.USER_EMAIL, UR.RESUME_NO, UR.RESUME_TITLE, SEND_DATE FROM SUGGEST SG JOIN USER_RESUME UR ON SG.RESUME_NO = UR.RESUME_NO JOIN USER_TABLE UT ON UR.USER_ID = UT.USER_ID WHERE BS_USER = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT SG.SG_NO, SG.SG_TITLE, RG.COMPANY_NAME, SG.SEND_DATE, SG.PS_USER FROM SUGGEST SG JOIN RECRUIT_REGIST RG ON SG.RA_NUM = RG.RA_NUM WHERE PS_USER = #{psUser} )
